sentences.en: A man who sat himself solidly in an arm-chair, and looked into the fire, so--A shower of ideas fell perpetually from some very high Heaven down through his mind.
sentences.cn: 这个人稳稳地坐在扶手椅里，凝视着炉火，就这样——一阵骤雨似的念头源源不断地从某个非常高的天国倾泻而下，进入他的头脑。

sentences.en: Christine's eyes moved to the solidly standing chair.
sentences.cn: 克丽丝汀的眼睛转向那只稳稳地摆着的椅子.

sentences.en: From ten feet apart they were locked in to one another, solidly, intimately, and inextricably.
sentences.cn: 他们在相距十英尺外紧紧拴在一起, 牢固地, 亲密地, 难分难解.
格雷厄姆能持之以恒，始终如一。

sentences.en: He hit him solidly and from as high up as he could raise the club.
sentences.cn: 他结结实实地打中了它,是把棍子举得尽量高才打下去的.

sentences.en: Now, three years later, Dr Lord was solidly entrenched at Felding - Roth.
sentences.cn: 现在, 三年过去了, 洛德博士在费尔汀 -- 罗斯公司稳稳地站住了脚.

sentences.en: People who had worked solidly since Christmas enjoyed the chance of a Friday off.
sentences.cn: 从圣诞节开始就一直上班的人星期五可以休息一天。

sentences.en: She's played solidly throughout the spring.
sentences.cn: 她整个春季的表现都非常出色。

sentences.en: The bureau of cherry was also high and wide and solidly built.
sentences.cn: 那个樱桃木镜也做得又高又大,十分牢固.

sentences.en: The house was built solidly of rough wooden planks.
sentences.cn: 这房子是用粗木板牢固地建造的.

sentences.en: The wall is of very solid construction , ie is solidly constructed.
Their house, which was solidly built, resisted the main shock.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子盖得十分坚固，经受住了主震。

sentences.en: This bridge is very solidly built.
Tromp the soil solidly , leaving no air pockets.
sentences.cn: 将土踩实, 不要留下空隙.

words.tran_cn: 固体的；可靠的；立体的；结实的；一致的
凝固，团结（solidify的过去式和过去分词形式）
使凝固（solidify的ing形式）；使团结；使充实
坚固地；坚硬地；团结一致地

trans.tran_cn: 坚固地，牢靠地，团结一致地，整整地
